title: 86/390/EEC: Commission Decision of 23 July 1986 amending Decision 83/423/EEC as regards the list of establishments in Paraguay approved for the purpose of importing fresh meat into the Community
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 23 July 1986
amending Decision 83/423/EEC as regards the list of establishments in Paraguay approved for the purpose of importing fresh meat into the Community
(86/390/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Annex to Decision 83/423/EEC is hereby replaced by the Annex to this Decision.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 23 July 1986.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 302, 31. 12. 1972, p. 28.
(2) OJ No L 362, 31. 12. 1985, p. 8.
(3) OJ No L 238, 27. 8. 1983, p. 39.
(4) OJ No L 315, 5. 12. 1984, p. 28.
(5) OJ No L 108, 26. 4. 1983, p. 18.
ANNEX
LIST OF ESTABLISHMENTS FROM WHICH FRESH MEAT MAY BE INTRODUCED INTO THE TERRITORY OF THE COMMUNITY ONLY UNTIL THE STATED DATE
